lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: Mostly I get to volunteer to various things, working for food pantries, building homes with Habitat for Humanity, etc.

lender.name: Roger & Sharon
lender.loan_because: We are thankful to be able to do so.
lender.occupational_info: I build & repair the interiors of boats. My wife works in a large office building and using a computer helps companys with their employee's health plans.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: I hope to help someone.
lender.occupational_info: I build and repair boats. I am mostly retired now.

lender.name: Chuck
lender.loan_because: I believe the establishment sometimes makes it hard for some to take their first steps towards success.
lender.occupational_info: I ensure employees of large companies are able to get information about their retirement and healthcare benefits

lender.name: Antonio & Giancarlo
lender.loan_because: I believe in the goodness of humanity and my son and I want to help others, even if we do not know them personally.
lender.occupational_info:
"The sole meaning of life is to serve humanity." - Tolstoy
May you succeed in your businesses and prosper. My son and I are honored to be of service to you.

lender.name: Randy
lender.loan_because: I feel a moral resposibility to help others in need.

lender.name: Ludovic
lender.loan_because: I want to help!
lender.occupational_info: I learn people how to learn.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping people out that want to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work with designing and manufacturing satellite products.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: Better than charity.

lender.name: The Bush Family
lender.loan_because: God has blessed us to be a blessing to others.

lender.name: Dale & Callie
lender.loan_because: We want to help spread our good fortune

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I would love to help others as others have helped me in a time of need.
lender.occupational_info: Im a supervisor for a Hi Tech company 'Sagem Morpho Inc." which does livescan fingerprinting for background checks.

lender.name: mike
lender.loan_because: We can all make a difference!
lender.occupational_info: I work with the medically underserved.

lender.name: Elin & René
lender.loan_because: We are aware of the problems related to dead capital, and find that micro-loans like the ones Kiva administrate are very useful when it comes to help people in the third world becoming economical active.
lender.occupational_info: Elin works in an insurance company and René is working in a office that administrate both temporary and permanent jobs.

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: I want women all over the world to have the same opportunities I've had in developing a career and business
lender.occupational_info: I help people improve their kitchens and bathrooms, so they can enjoy their homes even more than they already do.

lender.name: Pruski-Clawson Family
lender.loan_because: we have such great
lender.occupational_info: Our family has diverse occupations: salesmen, attorney, homemaker, retired, school children

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I know how much a loan means to an Entrepreneur. I feel as though I can truly help those with passion in a small way.
lender.occupational_info: I own a small manufacturing company in San Francisco, CA that employs 35 people

lender.name: Aussie School Friends
lender.loan_because: We feel connected to a common purpose, even though we now live all over the world.

lender.name: Mark Henry
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I make wine

lender.name: Tom & Lynn
lender.loan_because: l believe the type of micro loans provided through agencies like Kiva are the most effective means of encouraging economic development at the grass roots level. The success of individual entrepreneurs has a ripple effect in that it can inspire others to pursue their economic goals.

lender.name: Alexander
lender.loan_because: It's good!

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because: this is the best medium to have a direct impact on one entrepreneur, his/her family, his/her town and the greater world...
lender.occupational_info: I started my own insurance company in 2003.

lender.name: Susan & Bud
lender.loan_because: We're all in this together... It's one of our ways to reach out from a small town in SW Michigan to help others...

lender.name: S. Kent
lender.loan_because: When I'm thinking about buying something I really don't *have* to have or going out to a nice lunch when I have food at home that's perfectly good, I come home and come here occasionally ... and feel much better knowing that money is going to something that really is necessary.
lender.occupational_info: Trying to help the best healthcare products get out to the public faster

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: I know how hard it can be to get the funds necessary to start or run a small business. I also loan money because I believe in helping others, that is what I was taught to do... you never know when it might be you in need....
lender.occupational_info: I am a computer technician who believed in myself so much that I started a small business of my own doing on-site computer services for private clients and small businesses. I fix computers, build them and service them in many different ways. I LOVE what I do and love helping others, that is why I do it.

lender.name: Arlene
lender.loan_because: My husband and I are always looking for ways to help others improve their quality of life. Thank you KIVA for your innovative thinking and an easy-to-use website!

lender.name: Preston
lender.loan_because: I want to help people that need money for their business.
lender.occupational_info: I got to school to learn all that I can learn.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: alex
lender.loan_because: I want to help people
lender.occupational_info: I'm an electrical engineer. The company I work for specializes in making movable parts of buildings

lender.name: Kristen
lender.loan_because: I have worked with microfinance projects in Africa and have witnessed first hand the difference that each dollar can make.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who are willing to work hard to improve themselves, help their families, and learn to help others. Our world is one large community, and all the world's people are members of my community.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired from formal work, but I do some substitute teaching, I enjoy gardening, and I work with wood to make toys and other small items to give as gifts.

lender.name: Godfrey
lender.occupation: Ex Pro Soccer Player / Venture Capital Partner
lender.loan_because: For each Kiva entrepreneur, the fruits of their success are likely to be spent in their own community which in turn will continue to benefit that community. How cool is that!
lender.occupational_info: I used to kick a soccer ball around for a living, now I help fund businesses.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I want to help the poor
lender.occupational_info: My work is very interesting.I get to meet travellers from all acrooss the world and hear different stories of their cultures.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: A simple act can change a life, and life changed can change the world.

lender.name: Rob, Tami, and Nate
lender.loan_because: We loan because we are called to share what has been given to us.
lender.occupational_info: We raise Corriente Cattle. They are a Mexican breed of cattle, similar to the ones from Spain used in bull fighting. In America they are used in rodeos for team roping and steer wrestling. We also have a few horses.

lender.name: Piam
lender.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves.

lender.name: Rob
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: one that is In progress - still

lender.name: Rosa
lender.loan_because: I want to give more to people less fortunate. I work for the US Navy overseas and witnessed how poverty strictened these people really are. I'm not rich, but I know I don't need $25.00.
lender.occupational_info: I allow people to talk to each other through a T.V. I'm a Video Teleconference Technician. I just engineered a teleconference that our own US President Bush conducted. I was given a Letter of Appreciation for making sure the video conference went flawless:)

lender.name: St. Marys Episcopal
lender.loan_because: We are part of St. Mary's commitment to social justice and to support of the UN Millenium Development Goals.
lender.occupational_info: We are Marc & Teri , Kris & Rob, Natasha & David, Eric & Janice, Cynthia & David, Anne & , Jennifer & Jonathan, and E. Parrish... plus children. We're members of St. Mary's Episcopal Church in St. Paul, MN

lender.name: Jodi
lender.loan_because: Our family would like to help others around the world who are trying to make their dreams come true!
lender.occupational_info: I am a business owner of a consulting firm.

lender.name: Beth
lender.loan_because: I want to share what God has blessed me with. I also want others to succeed - one person, one life at a time...maybe, just maybe, we can help. Let's change this world for the better and be a more God worthy people.

lender.name: Liam and Aidan
lender.loan_because: People around the world need help and we feel that is our responsibility to help them.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: It a good feeling to help others run a small business and keep it growing.

lender.name: Philip
lender.loan_because: I enjoy learning about people worldwide and contributing to their success

lender.name: kera
lender.loan_because: I have more than I need and I want to help other people.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of my kids and volunteer in school.

lender.name: dkd
lender.loan_because: Because I try to live by Gandhi's mantra, "Be the change you wish to see in the World." & Bono's "It's not charity; It's justice."

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: I have the ability to and the knowledge and conscience to understand that I can make a difference in someone else's life
lender.occupational_info: Trying to gain the health care skills in school that I will be able to utilize for those who don't have access to adequate health care

lender.name: Cecil
lender.loan_because: I loan because I can.

lender.name: Vladimir
lender.loan_because: Offering working capital to less fortunate people is an attempt of redeeming them from their hardships.
lender.occupational_info: Originate, and structure trade finance, and commodity finance-related transactions.

lender.name: Romeo
lender.loan_because: I love people.
lender.occupational_info: I like sleeping, eating, pooping, checking the mail, going for walks, day dreaming, playing with other dogs and my family, rolling around in the hamper, barking... alot especially at birds.

lender.name: Buffy and Alan
lender.loan_because: We believe in you!

lender.name: Carolan
lender.loan_because: it supports people in a real way that encourages self reliance and self confidence.

lender.name: Nemr
lender.loan_because: I believe Kiva can be an important and fun part of ending poverty and helping people maximize their economic potential.
lender.occupational_info: I am an economist with a number of years working in commercial banking. I was a Kiva Fellow in 2009.

lender.name: Nadia
lender.loan_because: I want to help other people who are more hardworking and resilient than I am. I would like to give them access to resources that we are so fortunate to have in my part of the world.
lender.occupational_info: Scientist

lender.name: Niberkanitz
lender.loan_because: All great accomplishments require sacrifice and a helping hand from time to time. If the contribution I make to someone in need can help them realize their dreams, that is the greatest gift of all.

lender.name: Myriam
lender.occupational_info: My work : I treat physical problems resulting from illness, injury, disability or ageing thanks to manual therapy, movement, exercise.

lender.name: cathy
lender.loan_because: I love helping people with Kiva, it is so easy and it makes me feel good!

lender.name: Mark, Ali & O
lender.loan_because: We care

lender.name: PATRICIA A
lender.loan_because: I believe that if everyone does a little we can improve the world we all live in.
lender.occupational_info: I help improve the quality of child care through education and support of those who provide the care.

lender.name: Edgar
lender.loan_because: I believe that we are all connected in some way and we all need each other. Above all it’s always good to help someone to fulfill its dreams.
lender.occupational_info: My job consists in the transmission of knowledge related with the environmental issues, through a very simple, but effective approaches, that I hope will help the future generations to live in a better world that the one we all live nowadays.

lender.name: Gay
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone should have a chance to provide for themselves and their family.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in a small way and I admire entrepreneurs worldwide. Giving them a leg up is a way I can help, especially since they can avoid banks.
lender.occupational_info: I create my own websites. :)

lender.name: Janet
lender.loan_because: I believe in the principals of Proverbs 19:17. Give unto the poor you lend unto the Lord and that which you give He will repay.
lender.occupational_info: When someone is sick and goes to the doctor and the doctor needs to test their blood to see if there is some sickness, I draw the blood

lender.name: Valerie
lender.loan_because: It feels right, and it feels great!
lender.occupational_info: I have the world's most important job--I am a teacher. I teach middle school science, and I love it.

lender.name: juan
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I am always learning....

lender.name: The Austin/Rose Family
lender.loan_because: "Unless someone like you cares a whole lot, nothing's going to get better. No it's not." -Dr. Seuss

lender.name: Josh & Sara
lender.loan_because: We like helping others who are working to make their lives better in a sustainable way.

lender.name: Louise
lender.loan_because: Giving is a gift in the rewards received by seeing someone succeeding with their dreams through their accomplishments.
lender.occupational_info: Life coaching is assisting people in obtaining their goals through changing their beliefs in themselves. Together, we think in the "now" and forecast their desired state, selecting procedures in reaching their goal.

lender.name: Barry
lender.loan_because: I appreciate the entrepreneurial spirit in people. I want to support that for other's success.
lender.occupational_info: I am an entrepreneur also, I rehab old houses, and manage properties. I also help people get money sometimes.

lender.name: Patty
lender.loan_because: I like to watch my investments grow. Everyone in life... no matter age nor gender, nor religion, nor ethnicity, nor belief, nor orientation, nor possession...all who walk this planet deserve a sense of pride in a valuable existence. Everyone by their very being has a right not only to believe in hope but to experience its metamorphosis into something more. If it were not for the kind gifts and belief in me by others, I myself would not have the means to participate in Kiva.org
lender.occupational_info: I help to bring medicine from the "bench to bediside". I work to make certain that medicine does what it is supposed to do.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: This is a way to "pay it forward" and to give back to help others. I feel good knowing others can improve their lives with my help.
lender.occupational_info: I help people and organizations learn about Emergency Preparedness to lessen the impact of a disaster.

lender.name: Guy
lender.loan_because: The bankers of the world will not

lender.name: Marilyn
lender.loan_because: My desire is to emulate Jesus Christ in my actions and my words. Yes, Jesus would be at work loving and empowering the poor.

lender.name: Marlies
lender.loan_because: it's a good idea

lender.name: Ellen
lender.loan_because: I can. My life has been blessed and I wish to my share my blessings with others.
lender.occupational_info: My job is to make sure everyone in my company has what they need to do their jobs. I transfer telephone calls, take messages, pay the bills, order supplies, keep the office clean, run errands, and assist with client needs. I also make sure we never run out of chocolate!

lender.name: Lori
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I am a casemanager for homeless shelters and domicillary homes

lender.name: Kelly
lender.occupational_info: I am a college student majoring in psychology and minoring in anthropology.

lender.name: Kerri
lender.loan_because: I want to help others help themselves - to improve their quality of life and to make the world a happier, better place.

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: I think it is important to try and help others who have less means afforded to them.
lender.occupational_info: from clays I make beads,Pendants,earrings,flowers,animals,and sell on the internet

lender.name: Shawn
lender.loan_because: EVERYBODY Needs Someone And Something To Believe In!!! GOD Is Good, GOD Is In Control, And GOD Has Provided.
lender.occupational_info: I am here to allow GOD to use me to share HIS love.

lender.name: Dolly
lender.loan_because: my daughter introduced me to Kiva by lending as a Christmas present.
lender.occupational_info: I work from home and manage a small online jewelry store.

lender.name: thomas
lender.loan_because: a small amount can mean a lot to people trying to improve their lives through their own initiative

lender.name: Edna
lender.loan_because: I have been compelled to help others become self sufficient.
lender.occupational_info: Investigate allegations for child abuse.

lender.name: Ashley
lender.loan_because: even with a $9 an hour part time job and full time student, I CAN! There are people out there with so much money they do not know what to do with it, and they do not loan. I feel as a compassionate human being I need to help whoever, whenever, however I can.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a restaurant part-time and I am a full time student at Chico State University.

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: I have a small grasp on what it is like to be down and out.
lender.occupational_info: I clean up dirty groundwater.

lender.name: Diana
lender.loan_because: I feel like I have too much, and I don't appriciate it. I would rather see others, those who might have a better use for the money than I do, use the money.
lender.occupational_info: I study and I work very hard in order to fill my brain with knowledge... I go to school.

lender.name: Rob & Mary
lender.loan_because: We have enough to share and be thankful for.
lender.occupational_info: Rob is a news photographer. Mary is a nurse.

lender.name: Julia
lender.loan_because: It's what people do in the world I want to live in

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: I was given money

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: I want to help others help themselves. My dollars do a lot more in some other countries than they can do here.

lender.name: Carolina
lender.loan_because: we all deserve a chance...

lender.name: Howard
lender.loan_because: I hope it helps the borrowers be more successful so they can continue to support there families.
lender.occupational_info: I tell lenders what I think homes are worth.

lender.name: melissa
lender.loan_because: To assist others in fulfilling dreams and making a better life for themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: Mother, seeker, & recently completed graduate school.

lender.name: Irene
lender.loan_because: There are so many people in this world that need help and if I can make a change what a wonderful world.
lender.occupational_info: I am a caregiver with seniors and they bring joy to my life.They make me happy to be in this world.

lender.name: Noel
lender.loan_because: I care to make a difference

lender.name: tina
lender.loan_because: i hope to help some folks improve their lives.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I've been very blessed in my life with people who where there for me and my family in our time of need and I want to try and repay those acts of kindness back to the people who need it now.
lender.occupational_info: I manage 14-15 customer service representatives that answer tax related questions from taxpayer's all over the world.

lender.name: Martha
lender.loan_because: I think that it is important to help others become sucessful and feel good about making a better life for their family.
lender.occupational_info: I help people to invest their money. By making their money grow they are able to have the freedom to accomplish their dreams and take care of their families.

lender.name: Sue
lender.loan_because: The rewards of lending far exceed the paltry rewards of bank interest on my money. I feel like I know the recipients of my loans and I feel so happy that I can help them achieve some financial independence.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired from jobs in medical publishing. I "work" as a volunteer every day in church and community activities and trying to keep up with my grandchildren.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: the people who need these loans are hard working and devoted to bettering their lives, if I can make a small difference that is my reward.
lender.occupational_info: I paint watercolors, knit, felt and work a lot with my hands, that is why I try to support the artistic endeavors of others when they come up on Kiva.

lender.name: Pamela
lender.loan_because: I want to support women entrepreneurs.

lender.name: Danielle
lender.loan_because: "Let us touch the dying, the poor, the lonely and the unwanted according to the graces we have received and let us not be ashamed or slow to do the humble work.” Mother Teresa
lender.occupational_info: Entertainer

lender.name: Beth
lender.loan_because: "You must be the change you want to see in the world." -- Gandhi
lender.occupational_info: I provide training to researchers to help them be successful in their work while acting ethically. I specialize in working with researchers from low-resource environments.

lender.name: Mirza Tashrif
lender.loan_because: I am now going to set up a new business of Developing a Software Firm.
lender.occupational_info: Activities will be: 1. Software Development, 2. Website Development, 3. Hardware Maintenance & Trouble Shooting, 4. IT and Network Support, 5. Data Entry Job, 6. Designing and Illustration.

lender.name: deena
lender.loan_because: i can

lender.name: Maria Maciak
lender.loan_because: I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: I make videos and work in a school.

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: Economically empowered women help their families and countries out of poverty. Microlending is an investment in everyone's prosperity.

lender.name: Nalita
lender.loan_because: I want to give others the opportunity to become self-sufficient.

lender.name: LaDawn
lender.loan_because: I believe that giving even if you can only give alittle can change a persons life.
lender.occupational_info: I am a mother first, raising my two children (6 years and 3 years). As a physical therapist I help those who are sick heal.

lender.name: Owen
lender.loan_because: Wu-Tang Clan is for the children.
lender.occupational_info: I am a problem solver, call me Revolver.

lender.name: Cat
lender.loan_because: I can. and because I was raised to believe that it is important to do what you can to help others. We are all here together.
lender.occupational_info: I am a social worker. i work with persons who have hemophilia and other bleeding disorders. Previously, I worked with people with mental illness. I am fortunate to know and work for my clients.

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because:
I have had a great deal of good fortune in my life. This is one of the ways I would like to give back and help others all over the world.
Paz y Amor

lender.name: Serin
lender.loan_because: I want to help others.
lender.occupational_info: Marketing person.

lender.name: Chris THE stonehead
lender.loan_because: 'The best thing about kiva is that you get your money back" Chris Pan

lender.name: Daniel
lender.occupation: The best child a parent can have
lender.loan_because: My parents want me to have a good education. One of the things that I have to learn is the value of sharing.

lender.name: Albert
lender.loan_because: We al sould help poor people. Because whe al live on the same world.

lender.name: Pjotr
lender.loan_because: It's a little amount that can make a difference for some one who wants to start something new. That's good to see!

lender.name: Nimilote
lender.loan_because: Need help in setting up a canteen extending our small scale farm and also in purchasing more calves for a milking station
lender.occupational_info: Luckily we still have our own native land and that is what i am trying to utilize

lender.name: Lars-Ake
lender.loan_because: I think that we in the "western" world have such a good situation, so we can really afford to help other. And should do. It does not matter, really, if we get any money back. Not for me anyway.

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: I truly want to help make a difference in this world while I am here walking upon it. As a business owner myself, who grew up with two parents that were small business owners, I understand how difficult it is to start, be successful, and grow that business - as the capital that's needed at times.
lender.occupational_info: I help people to find, buy, and dell their homes - whether they are 1st time homebuyers, people who are looking for the home of their dreams, or folks who might be looking to downsize to a smaller place. "Home" has such deep meaning to me and all of teh things that it denotes - gatherings with family & friends, fond memories, quiet moments together. So much of life revolves around "home" amd I'm proud and nonored to help people find a place that they can call "home".

lender.name: stephanie
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Anita
lender.loan_because: when God closes a door He opens a window. Our job is to find the window.

lender.name: Piotr
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Karin
lender.loan_because: it is the right thing to do! Especially in places like Tajikistan where I have visited and I know the economy is very difficult and where a little bit could change someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: I work for an international aid organization and focus on the nutrition of children and women.

lender.name: Arcadia
lender.loan_because: I love the way KIva loans just continue to give and give.
lender.occupational_info: I inspire people to make a difference in the world - to help ease the suffering of people living in extreme poverty.

lender.name: Talal
lender.loan_because: What I have is also a Loan from God.

lender.name: frgdr.com
lender.loan_because: "When you help others, You can't help helping yourself!" --- Avenue Q Musical

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: it is the most effective way to help people improve their communities.
lender.occupational_info: Group Operational VP for the leading North American manufacturer of Architectural metal and wood door opening solutions.

lender.name: Beth Ann
lender.loan_because: I care! It is a privilege to give to others and this is a wonderful avenue for giving to those who have dreams! I am so glad that Kiva exists!! I am giving gift certificates as frequently as possible.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently not working outside the home but feel that my current job is to be the support that my family and friends need and be available for whoever needs me whenever they need me!

lender.name: Cemre
lender.loan_because: i believe the way to help, is by giving them the opportunity to help them selves.

lender.name: Brandon
lender.loan_because: The generosity and faith of others is what helped me achieve what I have today.
lender.occupational_info: I evaluate computer systems and determine what maintenance is needed, as well as developing new systems to increase productivity.

lender.name: Colleen M.
lender.loan_because: It's one world!

lender.name: Bob and Cindy
lender.loan_because: It is what we should do in this world.

lender.name: Cassandra
lender.loan_because: My Aunt Beth gave me $100.00 to use on Kiva to help me learn about other people and make them smile.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student who loves to read and play with my dogs!

lender.name: Amizadai
lender.loan_because:
I lend because I can!
I was very blessed to have the support of loved ones when I decided to start my own business. Making micro-loans is a small way of paying it foward!
lender.occupational_info: I have my own business providing wedding video services.

lender.name: Coffee Ladies
lender.loan_because: We have been getting together weekly for 25 years sharing our lives and supporting each other. This is our way of sharing and supporting others.

lender.name: DuncanMom
lender.loan_because: Having my son see what true social justice is all about. That is faith - in action.
lender.occupational_info: I support my colleagues in saving lives through organ and tissue donation. Register as am organ and tissue donor today!

lender.name: Parents of Lucas Silvio
lender.loan_because: In the long run, acts of justice (rather than simple charity), such as these loans, will change our world for the better. We are so excited to have this option made easily accessible through kiva.org!

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate to be an American which means I have many luxuries like good food and good shelter and clean water.

lender.name: Self
lender.loan_because: a helping hand can make a lot of difference in someone's life...

lender.name: Jørn & Yingyin
lender.loan_because: it is a great way to help people, and it's fun!

lender.name: Miles
lender.loan_because: No particular reason, just enjoy helping people being successful.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a team that provides customer service support to the largest telecommunication company in the world.

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: Why wouldn't I want to help others help themselves? This is the perfect thing...
lender.occupational_info: I help large companies use technology to do things better.

lender.name: Noah
lender.loan_because: We are all one big community

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I direct several programs at a community college.

lender.name: Kym
lender.loan_because: I believe this to a superb way of getting young people involved in the world.
lender.occupational_info: University Professor, Art and Design, Activism

lender.name: Bobby
lender.loan_because: My Mom was a widow who raised 9 children by herself to all receive higher education and to do the right thing.
lender.occupational_info: I study problems in business causing waste and inefficiency to develop solutions for higher productivity, profits and employee satisfaction with their enviroment.

lender.name: Eilish
lender.loan_because: In memory of my lovely Mom and Dad.

lender.name: P. C.
lender.loan_because: It's a wonderful way to help people help themselves.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I believe in individuals who want to make something of themselves and their businesses who are proud and thankful for their success for themselves, their famiy and their community.
lender.occupational_info: My work supplies high security products to Fire Department and Emergency Medical personal so they can help others.

lender.name: cory & amy
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Yves
lender.loan_because: the money goes to people who can make better use of it than me!

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: I follow Jesus and he said to seek first the kingdom of God and his righteousness/justice...

lender.name: Fritz Family
lender.loan_because: We like to help emerging entrepreneurs!

lender.name: Margaret
lender.loan_because: Although I am not rich we have so much in America. I would like to share with those who are trying to make their lives better by hard work and making a business.

lender.name: Monica
lender.loan_because: William Penn once said, "If there is any kindness I can show, or any good thing I can do to any fellow human being, let me do it now, and not defer or neglect it, as I shall not pass this way again." Thank you Kiva for providing us with this opportunity!
lender.occupational_info: I contribute to the happiness of individuals by providing the guidance they seek in maximizing the power within themselves and their businesses.

lender.name: John and Tracy
lender.loan_because: We want to help people.
lender.occupational_info: I build homes and commercial buildings

lender.name: Michael and Kathy
lender.loan_because: We love the fact that small loans can affect someone so much. In a world where the politicians often fail us the answer is to solve the problems ourselves. KIVA allows us to feel we are doing the tiniest part of doing that.

lender.name: Geoff Barnard
lender.loan_because: I've been in the Peace Corps as well as worked all my career in the non-profit sector. Kiva seems like a brilliant way to connect people together to help improve lives.
lender.occupational_info: I wrapped up a career as a non-profit executive in 2005 after 33 years with The Nature Conservancy, the Grand Canyon Trust, and The Arboretum at Flagstaff. I now use my experience, especially in fundraising and marketing, as a non-profit consultant to help other organizations be as good as they can be.

lender.name: sebastien
lender.loan_because: I love backing entrepreneurs
lender.occupational_info: investing in companies / backing entrepreneurs with good business ideas

lender.name: Evelyn C.
lender.loan_because: I want to empower the lives of people around the world
lender.occupational_info: I work in a hospital setting with patients whom just had surgery

lender.name: Kim Gibson
lender.loan_because: it feels good to help people who are in, somewhat better need of money than I am, when it comes to get a good and perhaps, better life for them selves! We in the "western" world are so spoiled and take most of our "good life" for granted... We should ALL try and give some more; of everything ... to those who are less fortunate!
lender.occupational_info:
I work as a veterinary technician in an Animal Hospital - the equivalence of a registered nurse in humane medicine. My tasks are to assist the veterinarian with everything; give shots, draw blood samples and run them, put the animals on IV meds, take x-rays, sell cat and dog food in our store and lots more! I LOVE it!!
The cat in the photo is my own, her name is Mimys :-)

lender.name: Mary Lee
lender.loan_because: I think it is a great way to add my light to the "sum of lights" working to illuminate the world. I enjoy that I get to have a small connection with people across the world who are working hard. I appreciate the KIVA organization making this possible.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a group of materials engineers who are part of teams that design, build and maintain the engines that power airplanes, helicopters and ships. I have a great husband and two beautiful daughters, and I am very lucky!

lender.name: Hardison Sims Family
lender.loan_because: If we work together we can make our world a happier, healthier and more peaceful place to live and work.
lender.occupational_info: (Jen) I work with teachers and students to learn more about the International Baccalaureate Programme. I help students find worthwhile service projects and help teachers write curriculum that will hopefully change the world for the better. (Dusty) Started a Home Inspection Co in San Diego building off his 20+ years experience in custom electronics, integrated fire/code/alarm systems and construction.

lender.name: Language Resources
lender.loan_because: Language Resources is made up of translator and interpreter entrepreneurs from around the world. Lending a hand like this seems a positive way to join together. Plus, our "Kiva Pot-lucks" are FUN!
lender.occupational_info: Language Resources provides translations in over 55 languages and we send out interpreters across the state of North Carolina. We also teach English as a Second Language.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I've been blessed in my life and want to share my good fortune.
lender.occupational_info: I work in Internet technology.

lender.name: janie
lender.loan_because: I feel very blessed and want to pay it forward....do the right thing..make a difference....evenif it is a small way.
lender.occupational_info: I taught English as a second language for many years, then native american studies, now I am semi retired have 2 horses 2alpacas, 1llama, 3 dogs, and 3 cats and 1 terrific husband. I work promoting good nutriion, and awareness of asthma, diabetes and obesity...

lender.name: angie
lender.loan_because: I want to help others

lender.name: jim
lender.occupational_info: I was a fire investigator and SOCO (CSI without the hummer and the mood lighting) in the Irish police force and now I am soco again, recently in Milton Keynes and now in St. Helier in the UK.

lender.name: Charles
lender.loan_because: I want others to have the opportunity to improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I sell and service lawn care equipment.

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: I have had to work hard for everything in my life. I understand well , how much even a small amount of support can mean.
lender.occupational_info: Contract the installation and repair of heating and cooling equipment.

lender.name: Ginny
lender.occupation: Retired health care worker. A citizen activist

lender.name: Seth
lender.loan_because: I pay it forward.

lender.name: Kristi
lender.loan_because: i believe in paying it forward.
lender.occupational_info: executive do-gooder.

lender.name: Fran
lender.loan_because: I support people's hard work, ingenuity, and their dreams to improve their lives and those of their children. Handouts are not the answer... supporting people in their own dreams is!
lender.occupational_info: I am a counsellor in private practice working mainly with couples and families. I grew up on the farm and know the value of hard work, still love gardening!

lender.name: Brandeis Posse 8
lender.loan_because: We are a group that is dedicated to staying together and helping each other through the best and the hardest times of our lives. As a group we understand how one person can help change the life another in extraordinary ways.
lender.occupational_info: Our group is made up of 10 college students, our mentor who works with us on campus, and his wife.

lender.name: Ruth
lender.loan_because: I enjoy it! I've been self-employed so I know how hard it is to make it as an entrepreneur.
lender.occupational_info: I buy and sell used books.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: At least in some small way I can help someone else achieve something that might only be a dream otherwise.

lender.name: Manuel
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me to come out of poverty as a youth to provide me with prosperity and responsibility as an adult. Along the way many have blessed me in my life to get here and I would like pass along blessings to others as have been provided me.
lender.occupational_info: I negotiate financial agreements between my company and other companies and foster mutually beneficial relationships.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: It's a great program and a way to help people directly.

lender.name: Gillian and Gary Katz
lender.occupational_info: Helping children...one at a time!

lender.name: Ann
lender.loan_because: My family decided to make loans rather than giving each other Christmas gifts this year.

lender.name: Michael & Darcy
lender.loan_because: To help in ways that really are needed, not just what we might imagine.
lender.occupational_info: Michael is an English teacher at public schools and Darcy is a family practice physician.

lender.name: Scott & MaryAnn
lender.loan_because: A wave a ripple makes!
lender.occupational_info: Retailer of licensed NFL and New York Yankees gifts and clothing.

lender.name: Gary
lender.loan_because: As a high school senior studying global cultures, I have often thought about how I could use the resources I have to help those in need throughout the world. Through Kiva I can help people improve their own economic situations with long term results. I am hoping that by actively participating in the loan process, I can directly help some people, report my experience to classmates, members of my school district and my community and raise their awareness of this program. Hopefully I can help others realize that a small loan from them can make a world of difference in the fight against poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I am in my final year of high school. I work part-time doing lawn care, yard work, carpentry and house painting. Next year I plan to attend college and study engineering.

lender.name: Geoff
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs a little help sometime.

lender.name: Brenda
lender.loan_because: I can make a difference by helping others.
lender.occupational_info: Technical.

lender.name: Janelle
lender.loan_because: Every human being deserves to have meaningful work to do that allows them to feel a sense of purpose, to earn a basic standard of living and to be able to acquire not only the things that they need to survive but perhaps even a few special items that bring them joy. I believe people are meant to be living more in community in this world and any monetary wealth of my own is only worth what it can bring to individuals and communities in terms of enriching lives and the human experience for all people- regardless of place or situation.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: Great opportunity to support people who know the value of money and work.
lender.occupational_info: Help others to define problems and solve them
